name: 4X Project
description:
Project made for the purpose of passing a subject "Individual project" at Warsaw University of Technology

Author:  Patryk Chojnicki
Coordinator: dr inż. Krzysztof Hryniów

Code attributions:

Base of map generation based on https://github.com/SebLague/Procedural-Landmass-Generation
A* algorithm based on tutorial made on Youtube by Code Monkey
